content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to first craft the crimson planks required for the sword. I have a crimson hyphae at slot 42, so I will move it to slot 1 to craft the planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}]
thought: I have crafted the crimson planks, but they are currently in the crafting slot. I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can use them later.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a wooden sword I need to place planks in slots 1, 2 and stick in slot 5. The only planks in my inventory are dark oak planks in slot 17, so I will start by moving one of those to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to move another plank to slot 4 which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, I need to move a stick to slot 7 which is below slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 39, "index": 24}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that I have placed all the ingredients in the correct slots, I can craft the wooden sword and move it to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
